name: Escape PS2 Hagrid
description:
Hagrid makes his return in this mind-breaking sequel to the all-time bestselling piece of software junk "Escape PS1 Hagrid". With over 200 game of the year awards, before the release this game happens to be a more than worthy successor to its predecessor.

Rated with "69/10" by the renowned newspaper "The onion"

16 times the detail

"Escape PS2 Hagrid" offers a more visually appearing gaming experience than ever before with full Ray-Tracing Support on Windows XP flagship computers. Never before have you been able to enjoy the chunky being that is Hagrid in 4K resolution.

It just works

This game offers a guaranteed bug-free experience. If you encounter any game beaking mechanics you should be aware that these are not bugs but unplanned features. Escape PS2 Hagrid is a perfectly balanced game with zero exploits.

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • MOUSE to look
  • SPACE to jump
  • E to interact/ pickup
  • LMB use spell
  • 1-4 equip spell
  • ESC to open menu
Gameplay

If the dialogue text is shown white, Harry is the one speaking.

If the dialouge is cyan an NPC is speaking.

There are 4 spells you can cast:

  • -Lumos: to cast a spark of light
  • -Alohomora: to open locked doors
  • -Crucio: to damage your opponents
  • -Protego: to cast a shield that doesn't work

There are 5 chapters to this game:

  • -Escape from Azkaban
  • -The forbidden Forest
  • -Hagrid, ancient god of calamity
  • -Hogwarts
  • -The final showdown
